citation: Proclamation under the National Parks and Wildlife Act 1970 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the National Parks and Wildlife Act 1970

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and with the approval of Each House of Parliament, by this my proclamation made under sections 14 and 16 of the National Parks and Wildlife Act 1970 declare â€“

        (a) that the area of land given the name Little Beach Conservation Area and specified in section 17 of, and Schedule 9 to, the Regional Forest Agreement (Land Classification) Act 1998 ceases to be reserved land; and
        (b) the Crown land specified in Part 1 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Little Beach Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (c) that the area of land given the name Low Head Conservation Area and specified in section 17 of, and Schedule 9 to, the Regional Forest Agreement (Land Classification) Act 1998 ceases to be reserved land; and
        (d) the Crown land specified in Part 2 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Low Head Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (e) that the area of land given the name Recherche Bay Nature Recreation Area and specified in section 19 of, and Schedule 10 to, the Regional Forest Agreement (Land Classification) Act 1998 ceases to be reserved land; and
        (f) the Crown land specified in Part 3 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of nature recreation area and give the name Recherche Bay Nature Recreation Area to that reserved land; and
        (g) that the area of land given the name Seymour Conservation Area and specified in section 17 of, and Schedule 9 to, the Regional Forest Agreement (Land Classification) Act 1998 ceases to be reserved land; and
        (h) the Crown land specified in Part 4 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Seymour Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (i) that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
17 December 2001

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Primary Industries, Water and Environment

SCHEDULE 1 - Areas of land

PART 1 - Little Beach Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 65 hectares shown bounded by a heavy black line on Plan Number 5598 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 1 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 2 - Low Head Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 14.4 hectares shown bounded by a heavy black line on Plan Number 5596 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 2 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 3 - Recherche Bay Nature Recreation Area

All that area of land comprising about 317.7 hectares shown bounded by a heavy black line on Plan Number 5599 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 3 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 4 - Seymour Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 113 hectares shown bounded by a heavy black line on Plan Number 5597 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 4 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

SCHEDULE 2 - Plans

PART 1 - Little Beach Conservation Area

PART 2 - Low Head Conservation Area

PART 3 - Recherche Bay Nature Recreation Area

PART 4 - Seymour Conservation Area

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 December 2001

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Water and Environment.
